title: The Golf Omnibus
description: 31 perfect golf shots from the pen of P.G. Wodehouse. Play the game the P.G. Wodehouse wayâ€”with wit, charm, and a touch of mischief. You'll discover:• How love on the links can lead to the worst kinds of hazards.• A nation where golf is God and all the subjects are in heaven.• Wagers in the rough that can drive millionaires to distraction.• The terrors of teeing off, the frustrations on the fairway, the perils of putting,• And much, much more!Stories that will keep you on course...and keep you laughing!
author: P.G. Wodehouse
